        public java.util.Set<Depot> generateRandomDepots(int number,
                                                 double left,
                                                 double right,
                                                 double top,
                                                 double bottom,
                                                 int min,
                                                 int max)
        Generate some random depots
        Parameters:
        number - the number of the depots
        left - the smaller number of the latitude
        right - the bigger number of the latitude
        top - the smaller number of the longitude
        bottom - the bigger number of the longtitude
        min - the min cost
        max - the max cost
        Returns:
        the set of the depots
